title: Wallpapers

properties.name: description
properties.value: Wallpapers (also known as backgrounds) were found on the "Downloads" section of the RuneScape website between approximately 2004 and 2013, alongside the official client and the world map. They were made from official artwork, and could be downloaded at several resolutions. They would sometimes first appear in Postbag from the Hedge before or alongside being released as wallpapers.

content:
The RuneScape Wiki also has an article on: rsw:Wallpapers

Wallpapers (also known as backgrounds) were found on the "Downloads" section of the RuneScape website between approximately 2004 and 2013, alongside the official client and the world map. They were made from official artwork, and could be downloaded at several resolutions. They would sometimes first appear in Postbag from the Hedge before or alongside being released as wallpapers.

Wallpapers based on Old School RuneScape are currently released on the official Flickr account.

Contents

    • 1.1 Warrior and Skeleton
    • 1.2 Wandering Warrior

    • 1.27 Drakan's Bloodline
    • 1.28 Fremennik Warrior

Archive[edit | edit source]

Warrior and Skeleton[edit | edit source]

Release date: 2004

A very detailed wallpaper featuring the RuneScape Warrior and Skeleton.

  • 800x600

  • 1204x768

  • 1280x1024

  • 1600x1200

Wandering Warrior[edit | edit source]

Release date: 2004

A wallpaper depicting a warrior wandering in the fields of RuneScape.

  • 800x600

  • 1024x768

  • 1280x1024

  • 1600x1200

The Grand Tree[edit | edit source]

Release date: 27 October 2004 (Update:The Grand Tree Wallpaper)

This recently unearthed drawing of the Grand Tree should make an exquisite backdrop for your computer.

  • 800x600

  • 1024x768

  • 1280x1024

  • 1600x1200

RuneScape Map[edit | edit source]

Release date: 4 November 2004 (Update:World Map Wallpaper)

An excellent drawing of the RuneScape world. Something every traveller should have in their backpack.

  • 800x600

  • 1024x768

  • 1280x1024

  • 1600x1200

Green Dragon[edit | edit source]

Release date: 15 December 2004 (Update:New Wallpaper And Updated Map)

Unfortunately we can't offer you a real dragon to keep in your garden, but we can offer you this flaming good picture of one!

  • 800x600

  • 1024x768

  • 1280x1024

  • 1600x1200

Bob's Last Stand[edit | edit source]

Release date: 26 April 2005 (Update:New Wallpaper)

Bob the Jagex cat faces off against the Kalphites - luckily everyone knows cats have 9 lives, so he's sure to be ok.

  • 800x600

  • 1024x768

  • 1280x1024

  • 1600x1200

Iban's Temple[edit | edit source]

Release date: 19 July 2005 (Update:Temple of Iban wallpaper)

Deep in the Underground Pass you can find a temple devoted to the once dead evil warrior: Iban.

  • 800x600

  • 1024x768

  • 1280x1024

  • 1600x1200

Rat Artwork[edit | edit source]

Release date: 11 October 2006 (Update:Players' Gallery and Wallpapers)

The rats of RuneScape are making quite a splash in the sewers with their fearsome new look!

  • 800x600

  • 1024x768

  • 1280x1024

  • 1280x1024

  • 1600x1200

  • 1920x1200

Bear Artwork[edit | edit source]

Release date: 11 October 2006 (Update:Players' Gallery and Wallpapers)

No one would be likely to make a cuddly toy out of this particular bear, and few would choose to get close enough to try!

  • 800x600

  • 1024x768

  • 1280x1024

  • 1280x1024

  • 1600x1200

  • 1920x1200

Elemental Artwork[edit | edit source]

Release date: 11 October 2006 (Update:Players' Gallery and Wallpapers)

2006 saw a bold new look for the elementals of RuneScape. Still going with rocky themes, but jazzed up with rich seams of colour, and a little plant life for that natural look. It was an exciting year for elemental fashion!

  • 800x600

  • 1024x768

  • 1280x1024

  • 1280x1024

  • 1600x1200

  • 1920x1200

Gnome Restaurant[edit | edit source]

Postbag appearance: 27 September 2006 (Transcript:Baba Yaga, Hill Giants and correct pronunciation!

Release date: 11 October 2006 (Update:Players' Gallery and Wallpapers)

The gnome restaurant is an acquired taste, offering peculiar dishes and 'original' flavours.

  • 800x600

  • 1024x768

  • 1280x1024

  • 1600x1200

Trouble Brewing[edit | edit source]

Release date: 11 October 2006 (Update:Players' Gallery and Wallpapers)

Landlubbers beware: thar be Trouble Brewing on the horizon!

  • 800x600

  • 1024x768

  • 1280x1024

  • 1600x1200

Barbarian Assault[edit | edit source]

Release date: 11 October 2006 (Update:Players' Gallery and Wallpapers)

The healers always keep an eye out for wandering barbarians and unprepared adventurers.

  • 800x600

  • 1024x768

  • 1280x1024

  • 1600x1200

Sheep and Goat Artwork[edit | edit source]

Release date: 13 November 2006 (Update:Player gallery and more bank space)

Every world needs a balance. With so many fearsome creatures inhabiting the landscape, where would an adventurer be without the humble sheep to provide some much needed calm?

  • 800x600

  • 1024x768

  • 1280x1024

  • 1600x1200

Spider Artwork[edit | edit source]

Release date: 13 November 2006 (Update:Player gallery and more bank space)

Arachnophobia is defined as an irrational fear of spiders. Having seen the new-look spiders in RuneScape, we say there's nothing irrational about a little fear!

  • 800x600

  • 1024x768

  • 1280x1024

  • 1600x1200

Imp Artwork[edit | edit source]

Release date: 13 November 2006 (Update:Player gallery and more bank space)

What yer lookin' at, eh? So what if we imps 'ave gone an' got ourselves a bran' spankin' look? Ya got a problem? Nah, din't fink so...

  • 800x600

  • 1024x768

  • 1280x1024

  • 1600x1200

Lava Dwarf[edit | edit source]

Postbag appearance: 30 October 2006 (Transcript:Rats, Pirates and the Wise Old Man!)

Release date: 2006

We've heard of those who like their bathwater hot, but the lava dwarves take it to a ridiculous level. The words 'cold tap' are not in their vocabulary!

  • 800x600

  • 1024x768

  • 1280x1024

  • 1600x1200

Mummy Artwork[edit | edit source]

Release date: 16 January 2007 (Update:Interfaces and spooky wallpapers)

Mummy mia! They may be deceased and wrapped in bandages from head to toe, but that doesn't mean they can't look great!

  • 800x600

  • 1024x768

  • 1280x1024

  • 1280x1024

  • 1600x1200

  • 1920x1200

Zombie Artwork[edit | edit source]

Release date: 16 January 2007 (Update:Interfaces and spooky wallpapers)

Brains..... BRAAAAINS!

  • 800x600

  • 1024x768

  • 1280x1024

  • 1280x1024

  • 1600x1200

  • 1920x1200

Ghost and Spirit Artwork[edit | edit source]

Release date: 16 January 2007 (Update:Interfaces and spooky wallpapers)

Angry tree spirits and icy apparitions - enough to send a chill down anyone's spine!

  • 800x600

  • 1024x768

  • 1280x1024

  • 1280x1024

  • 1600x1200

  • 1920x1200

Wise Old Man[edit | edit source]

Postbag appearance: 28 November 2006 (Transcript:The Evil Chicken defends his reputation.)

Release date: 16 January 2007 (Update:Interfaces and spooky wallpapers)

The wise old man is deep in thought, pondering his latest and greatest adventure... or perhaps just deciding what to have for dinner tonight!

  • 800x600

  • 1024x768

  • 1280x1024

  • 1280x1024

  • 1600x1200

  • 1920x1200

Wish You Were Here[edit | edit source]

Postbag appearance: 18 December 2006 (Transcript:The woeful tale of the bunny ears.)

Release date: 16 January 2007 (Update:Interfaces and spooky wallpapers)

Wait a second... if these guys are off enjoying their summer vacation, who on RuneScape is holding the detail select buttons?

  • 800x600

  • 1024x768

  • 1280x1024

  • 1280x1024

  • 1600x1200

  • 1920x1200

Robin Hood[edit | edit source]

Postbag appearance: 29 January 2007 (Transcript:Property Law and Vampyres.)

Release date: 2007

Robin manages to remain dapper while facing off against a band of not-so-merry imps!

  • 800x600

  • 1024x768

  • 1280x1024

  • 1280x1024

  • 1600x1200

  • 1920x1200

Elvarg[edit | edit source]

Postbag appearance: 13 March 2007 (Transcript:You enjoy Postbag from the Hedge.)

Release date: 2007

House prices on Crandor suddenly and inexplicably plummet!

  • 1280x1024

  • 1600x1200

Postbag appearance: 27 March 2007 (Transcript:Happy Birthday, Mr Elemental.)

Release date: 10 April 2007 (Update:Players' Gallery and New Wallpaper)

This mighty warrior has seen his fair share of battle, but until the war is won his resolve will not falter.

  • 1280x1024

  • 1280x1024

  • 1600x1200

Attack on Varrock[edit | edit source]

Postbag appearance: 30 April 2007 (Update:Postbag from the Hedge 18)

Release date: 30 April 2007 (Update:Postbag from the Hedge 18)

You can't keep a good necromancer down...or his legion of undead warriors. It looks like Varrock may be about to have a very bad day!

  • 1024x768

  • 1280x1024

  • 1280x1024

  • 1600x1200

Postbag appearance: 30 May 2007 (Update:Postbag from the Hedge 19)

Release date: 30 May 2007 (Update:Postbag from the Hedge 19)

There's nothing quite like the family portrait, even if your family are a bunch of blood sucking vampires!

Fremennik Warrior[edit | edit source]

Postbag appearance: 26 June 2007 (Update:Postbag from the Hedge 20)

The skies are aflame with the northern lights; a storm is coming...

rawContent:
{{external|rs}}
'''Wallpapers''' (also known as '''backgrounds''') were found on the "Downloads" section of the RuneScape website between approximately [[2004]] and [[2013]], alongside the official client and the world map. They were made from official artwork, and could be downloaded at several resolutions. They would sometimes first appear in [[Postbag from the Hedge]] before or alongside being released as wallpapers.

Wallpapers based on [[Old School RuneScape]] are currently released on the official [https://www.flickr.com/photos/150541131@N02/ Flickr account].

==Archive==

{{quote|A very detailed wallpaper featuring the RuneScape Warrior and Skeleton.}}

</gallery>
